name: Where's All the Money?
description:
Update(13/03/2017): Yoghurt has helped me get a working .exe which is now available to download.

An attempt to make a game in a short amount of time for the Resist Jam 2017. I'm normally an artist but, as you can see, I had zero time to do any of the art as I was butting heads with coding. Not my strongest point so I think I did alright overall.

Resist Jam site:
https://itch.io/jam/resistjam
